name: DeepBrownNoise
0:
”Alexa open deep brown noise”
”Alexa ask deep brown noise to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: deep brown noise
des:
Discover the soothing power of deep brown noise! Crafted to enhance your focus, relaxation, and sleep quality, this skill delivers a continuous, low-frequency rumble that mimics the calming sounds of nature. Ideal for drowning out distractions, reducing stress, and promoting deep sleep, our deep brown noise skill is your go-to solution for creating a tranquil environment wherever you are. Experience the benefits of enhanced concentration and restful nights. Immerse yourself in the serene world of deep brown noise!

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Deep Brown Noise
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
